name: Mech Mechanic Simulator
description:
Inside your own workshop check damage to lasers, miniguns, actuators and other parts.
Remove the damaged parts and insert new ones.
Modify existing mechs by changing their parts. Add new gun, change the body etc.
Start from a small workshop, buy new tools, do more expensive repairs, earn more and upgrade workshop.
After the repair, check if the mech is ready to fight.
